metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7548 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: SQLAlchemy 1.2.17 has SQL Injection when the group_by parameter can be controlled.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> since 1.0, sqlalchemy issues a warning when text() is omitted this fix for this issue turns the warning into an error since this change may break existing applications, it may not get fixed, marking priority as low

criterions.comment: sqlalchemy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
